articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of Large Combined Unit of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of Large Combined Unit of KPA
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army of the DPRK, inspected the Command of Large Combined Unit 324 of the KPA and its unit.
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Ri Yong Ho, chief of the KPA General Staff, KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk and Pak Jae Gyong and KPA Lieut. Generals Ro Hung Se and Ri Tu Song.
					
					 The first leg of his inspection was the command of Large Combined Unit 324 of the KPA.
					
					 He had a photo taken with its service personnel.
					
					 Then he went round the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to its history.  
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il which are recorded in the history of the unit, he said the unit grew to be a matchless elite unit under the wise leadership and meticulous care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Making the rounds of an operation study room, shooting gallery and other places, he acquainted himself with the training of the commanding officers.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the unit successfully built rooms for the study of military affairs so that its service personnel might deeply study and fully apply the Juche-based war methods of the WPK and is organizing effective trainings for boosting the ability to command operations.
					
					He gave valuable instructions for preparing all the commanding officers to be competent ones capable of skillfully organizing and commanding any difficult combat duty in a modern war.
					
					 He inspected a forward command post of the unit.
					
					 There he heard from the commander of the unit a report on the situation.
					
					Standing before an operational map, he looked over the defence theatre and learned in detail about the topographical features and the distribution of forces.
					
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of a city, villages, a lot of factories and fertile co-op fields, he said the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people are firmly guaranteed as the service personnel of the People's Army are standing guard with arms over the socialist country which cannot be bartered for anything. 
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to mercilessly wipe out the enemies in the forward areas along the defence line in view of their ceaseless moves to ignite a new war and thus safeguard the socialist country as firm as an iron wall.
					
					 He inspected Unit 156 of the KPA honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					
					 He had a photo session with its service personnel.
					
					 After hearing a report on the decision from the commander of the unit, he acquainted himself with its training.
					
					 The unit has a very important duty to perform, he said, putting forth important tasks to serve as guidelines for bolstering its combat capability.
					
					 Noting that the primary duty of a soldier is to undergo training well, he underscored the need for the unit to focus all efforts on intensifying training and prepare the service personnel of the unit as all-round fighters capable of performing themselves any combat duties satisfactorily, in particular. 
					
					He made the rounds of a library and other facilities for ideological and cultural education to learn in detail about how political work is conducted among its service personnel.
					
					 He went round a bedroom, education room and lecture rooms for training of a company under the unit's direct control to take care of the living of its service personnel.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
im Yong Nam Meets Brazilian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Tuesday met and had a talk with outgoing Brazilian Ambassador to the DPRK Arnaldo Carrilho at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 On hand were vice-minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun and staff members of the Brazilian embassy here.

articles.title: Brazilian Ambassador Awarded DPRK Order
articles.content:
Brazilian Ambassador Awarded DPRK Order
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Arnaldo Carrilho, Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK, was awarded the DPRK Order of Friendship 2nd Class with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned and staff members of the Brazilian embassy here.
					
					 After a decree of the Presidium of the SPA was read out, DPRK Order of Friendship 2nd Class was awarded to Arnaldo Carrilho who has sent firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for their country's independent and peaceful reunification and the building of a thriving nation and made a positive contribution to the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Brazil.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Grenadian PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Grenadian PM
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Grenadian Prime Minister Tillman Thomas on the 38th anniversary of the country's independence.
					 The message wished him successes in the work for the country's progress and the people's welfare.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Dismisses Misinformation about It
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Dismisses Misinformation about It
 Moscow, February 6 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery Sukhinin said when interviewed by Interfax:
					 Mass media often report about the situation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Russia-DPRK relations with prejudice and falsify the reality.
					
					 Regretfully, foreign mass media, dealing with this issue, often create sensation by spreading groundless information and tend to twist the reality.
					
					 The life and work are normal in the DPRK despite the shock created by the demise of its leader.

articles.title: Title of People's Artiste Awarded to Singer
articles.content:
Title of People's Artiste Awarded to Singer
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The title of People's Artiste was conferred on Paek Mi Yong, singer of the State Merited Chorus, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Tuesday.
					 She made a contribution to encouraging the servicepersons and people who turned out in the advance of a great surge in building a thriving socialist nation through successful performing art pieces with high ideological value and artistry.

articles.title: National Pencil Drawing Festival Opens
articles.content:
National Pencil Drawing Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The 4th National Pencil Drawing Festival was opened at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre on Tuesday on the birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Presented to the festival, divided into groups of experts and amateurs, are at least 700 drawings selected from the pencil drawing shows which were held in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Among them are works "Missing the Father General", "May the Holy Mountain of Revolution Shine Forever", "General, You Cannot Leave Us like This" and "Birds, Too, Miss the General", which vividly pictured the Korean people's deep yearning for Kim Jong Il and the looks of them in bitter sorrow displayed during the period of mourning over the great national loss in December last.
					
					 Such works as "Oath" and "Footsteps" show the iron faith and will of the Korean army and people to invariably continue the march started in Mt. Paektu under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There are also works reflecting the joy and optimism of the people who lead a happy life under the socialist system and the ardent desire for national reunification in Korea.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Meet to Hear True Stories about Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Meet to Hear True Stories about Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The platform of true stories about General Secretary Kim Jong Il's virtues by the agricultural working people under the title of "The Fatherly General Will Always Be With Agricultural Working People" took place at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday on the occasion of his 70th birth anniversary.
					 The participants observed a moment's silence to the memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Taking the floor were Ri Yong Ae, chairwoman of the management board of the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County of South Hamgyong Province, Om Jong Sil, member of the Unhung Co-op Farm in Thaechon County of North Phyongan Province, Ri Yong Jun, member of the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province, and Pak Hye Gum, member of the Sodu  Farm in Taehongdan County of Ryanggang Province.
					
					 They expressed their ardent yearning and deep reverence for Kim Jong Il with their experiences.
					
					 He said that young people who volunteered to work at challenging and labor-consuming fields represent a true picture of the young Korean people and had a photo taken with a couple ordinary farmers, considerate of their simple wishes, they said.
					
					 The speakers sang a song "Thank You, Fatherly General" with yearning for him who showed great loving care for the DPRK agricultural working people.

articles.title: School Youth Make Study-tour of Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
School Youth Make Study-tour of Mt. Paektu Area
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country made study tour of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp from Feb. 1 to 7 with the approach of the 70th anniversary of his birth. 
					 They toured historic sites and battle sites including the then Command Post of the Pochonbo Battle, police post of the Japanese imperialists, subcounty office, Spring Site in Poso-ri, Tableland of Junghung, Phothae Revolutionary Site, Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site and Chongbong Bivouac Ground.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and flowers and bowed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower, Pochonbo Revolutionary Site, on the shore of Lake Samji and in the Chongbong Bivouac Ground and the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in the Paektusan secret camp. 
					
					 They held an oath-taking meeting before Kim Jong Il's birthplace. 
					
					 They visited the Paektu Museum, Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace and other edifices of the Songun era built in the town of Samjiyon County. 
					
					 During the tour they had meetings to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas, singing revolutionary songs in chorus while marching in array, publishing flash news, question-and-answer contest, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthplace Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthplace Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- More than 2,000 working people from all walks of life and school youth and children visit the old home of General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the secret camp in Mt. Paektu everyday on his 70th birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Going round relics, the visitors deeply looked back on the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who performed undying feats for the country, people, times and history with his outstanding political caliber and leadership ability.
					
					 Oath-taking meetings are being held by many study tour groups in front of the birthplace. They included those of school youth and children across the country, the Ministry of Railways and officials of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea across the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces US-S. Korea War Maneuvers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces US-S. Korea War Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. authorities are imprudent enough to urge the DPRK to "exercise self-restraint in provocations", describing joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle as regular and defensive ones. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 It was the U.S. warmongers who created military tension and are now crying out for "self-restraint," terming reaction to it "provocation" and the like. This cannot but be a height of shamelessness. 
					
					 The U.S. is busy informing the DPRK side of its saber-rattling in advance, claiming it poses no danger. But this gesture cannot alter the aggressive and provocative nature of the war exercises. 
					
					 The number of the troops of the U.S. forces and south Korean puppet forces and their latest means for attack to be involved in the war maneuvers and their contents and nature including landing operations clearly prove that they are of aggressive and preemptive nature from A to Z. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive on- looker to this reckless saber-rattling.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flays US-Japan Joint Military Exercise
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flays US-Japan Joint Military Exercise
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-Japan joint military exercise codenamed "Yamasakura" took place in Japan from January 24 to February 5. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This military maneuver staged with troops of the U.S. Army in the Pacific and Japan and the Ground Self-Defense Force of Japan involved was a dangerous war drill gravely threatening the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 Involved in this saber-rattling for the first time in history were troops of the U.S. 8th Army in south Korea which played a pivotal role in the last Korean War and is now acting as a main force in the U.S. moves for a new Korean war.
					
					 The participation of the above-said forces in the recent war maneuver indicates that the U.S. is keen to hold military supremacy not only in the Korean Peninsula but also in the rest of the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that if the U.S. strategy of attaching military importance to the Asia-Pacific region is carried out, it will escalate the military conflict and friction between the U.S. and other countries and finally spark off dangerous military confrontation. 
					
					 The U.S. oft-repeated "peace and security" are nothing but an artifice to fool the international community and a revelation of its ambition for aggression, war, military supremacy and domination. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to think twice of the grave consequences to be entailed by its anachronistic policy of military supremacy and confrontation.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts S. Korean Misinformation about DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts S. Korean Misinformation about DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- South Korea lied that the DPRK produced drugs and trafficked them with south Korea and China.
					 Member of south Korea's Saenuri Party Yun Sang Hyon, a faithful henchman of Chongwadae, spearheaded this smear campaign.
					
					 This is indicative of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors at deathbed, being forsaken by the people for its huge crimes against the nation.
					
					 The rhetoric spelled out by the Lee group is aimed to tarnish the DPRK's international image and divert domestic and international public opinion critical of it.
					
					 This brainchild is a last resort measure taken by those who were much upset by the harmonious whole of the DPRK which keeps moving forwards without the slightest vacillation even after the great loss to the nation.
					
					 The group of traitors hurt the Koreans when they were grieving over the loss, thus plunging the north-south ties into complete deadlock.
					
					 The Saenuri Party is so wretched as to be called rags party after its emergence for deteriorating people's livelihood and turning south Korea into a veritable hell harassed by evil and corrupt practices including drug abuses and murders.
					
					 It has constantly cooked up groundless "shocking news" to get rid of its sorry plight. It is, therefore, nothing surprising that it fabricated the trafficking issue.
					
					 The Lee group is hopelessly trying to find a way-out of the quagmire it is being mired.
					
					 It appears to try to divert the public attention, cover up its crimes and prolong its remaining days. But its gimmick will get it nowhere.
					
					 It is illogical for the group which is little match against the DPRK to slander it. Every sin brings its punishment with it.
					
					 The internet newspaper which echoed the misinformation should come to itself.

articles.title: GNP's Change of Name Ridiculed
articles.content:
GNP's Change of Name Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The emergency measure committee of the Grand National Party of south Korea on Feb. 2 decided on the name of the party as Saenuri Party, talking about the "support and trust by the people". 
					 Earlier, it made public a new policy calling for "equal opportunity of learning, flexible policy towards the north and democratization of economy the core of which are welfare, stable employment and fair market economy," etc. 
					
					 South Korean Kyunghyang Daily News said that GNP's dramatic change of the name is aimed at winning in the "National Assembly" election at hand and the "presidential" election. It is difficult to believe whether the GNP would remain committed to its new policy, the paper added. 
					
					 The south Korean people are now angered by the GNP. 
					
					 A poll conducted across south Korea in the new year showed that the majority is opposed to the GNP's stay in power. This is a stern warning against the traitorous party ill-famed for corruption, illegalities, deterioration of the people's livelihood and confrontation policy. 
					
					 The GNP driven into a tight corner is busy calling for "renovation" in fear of the punishment by the people. 
					
					 Changing the name of the party is a trite gimmick used by it to achieve its goals whenever it faced important political situation. 
					
					 It is natural that the south Korean people from all walks of life derided the party's declaration of the "change into a middle-of-the-road conservative party" which came up with a new policy talking about the "support and trust by the people". 
					
					 "No one should harbor an illusion about the GNP," this is a lesson drawn by the south Korean people who had been subject to unemployment and poverty and all sorts of exploitation and oppression with their rights to existence deprived since the GNP's takeover. 
					
					 The GNP should not waste time away in foolish dream but make an apology before the whole nation for its past crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Refusal to Halve Registration Fee Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Refusal to Halve Registration Fee Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century  held a meeting in Seoul on Feb. 5 calling for the judgment of the authorities, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 They underscored the need to form "National Assembly" capable of solving the issue of registration fee and pass a bill on it through the NA.
					
					 They declared the university students would positively take an active part in this year's general election and "presidential" election and thus make them platforms for judging politicians and political parties opposed to halving the registration fee.

articles.title: Koreans in US Hail Appeal of DPRK Organization
articles.content:
Koreans in US Hail Appeal of DPRK Organization
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Federation of Koreans in the United States on February 4 issued a statement in support of an appeal to all Koreans at home and abroad made by the North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 The appeal, carrying the strong will to bring a new turning phase for independent reunification this meaningful year, clearly shows the way for preventing disasters of a nuclear war in the Korean Peninsula and achieving its peace and independent reunification, the statement said.
					
					 Though the anti-national and anti-reunification Lee Myung Bak "government" of south Korea is intensifying suppression by dint of the "Security Law", it can never dampen the nation's desire for independence, democracy, peace and reunification, it said.
					
					 The statement called for significantly holding joint reunification events of the nation on the occasions of the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration, as appealed by the above-said committee.
					
					 The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. will struggle against the anti-national separatist forces, hand in hand with all the patriotic forces at home and abroad, and do its best for the country's independent reunification and prosperity of the nation, it declared.

articles.title: Chinese Moved to Tears by DPRK Opera
articles.content:
Chinese Moved to Tears by DPRK Opera
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Daily on Feb. 3 carried an article titled "'Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai' moves people to tears despite language barrier".
					 The Phibada Opera Troup of the DPRK made performance tour of China with the opera on the theme of "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai", the paper said, and went on:
					
					 Korean artistes' performance of the opera deeply touched audiences through a perfect and flawless artistic ensemble of songs and dances. 
					
					 The vocal skill of the artiste who played the part of Zhu Yingtai was very high.
					
					 The story "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" was reproduced in a modern style by Chinese Shaoshing opera artistes and staged by Koreans as an opera in Korean.
					
					 This will no doubt add new beautiful pages to the history of cultural exchange between China and the DPRK in the future, too.

articles.title: Korean Books Donated to Cambodia
articles.content:
Korean Books Donated to Cambodia
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and books introducing the DPRK were donated to Cambodia.
					 A ceremony of donating books was held in Phnom Penh on Jan. 31.
					
					 Present there were the curator of the National Library of Cambodia and masses, the DPRK ambassador to Cambodia and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The books were conveyed to the curator of the library.
					
					 The curator thanked for donating the precious books.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Vietnamese TV
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Vietnamese TV
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Vietnamese Central TV screened a documentary introducing the DPRK.
					  Screening the images of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the TV said:
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a very beautiful and developed country though it was severely ravaged during the 1950-1953 war.
					
					 The Korean people made great achievements in all fields under the leadership of the President.
					
					 They are holding him as a legendary hero and eternal leader in high esteem.
					
					 Portraits of the smiling President are displayed in Pyongyang and all other parts of the country.
					
					 The Korean people also boundlessly revere Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias are in full bloom in all parts of the country.
					
					 The Tower of the Juche Idea is the one erected to symbolize the greatness of the Juche idea, the guiding idea of the DPRK.
					
					 Pyongyang is the most beautiful city in the world, a city in a park.
					
					 The DPRK has many monumental edifices.
					
					 The Korean people are proud of their great achievements.
					
					 The U.S. armed spy ship "Pueblo" captured by the Korean People's Army is an evidence of history showing the great victory of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is attaching very great importance to education.
					
					 Youth and children are growing to be the nation's talents possessed of rich knowledge at modern educational facilities including the Grand People's Study House and schoolchildren's palaces.
					
					 The DPRK is a country which greeted a heyday of culture and arts.
					
					 The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" staged at the May Day Stadium is a worldwide extravaganza.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Indonesian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Indonesian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Eko Suryo Santjojo, general chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, praised the undying feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 He said in a statement on Feb. 2:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was on his way of energetic field guidance till the last moments of his life, opening a bright prospect for building an economic power.
					
					 He firmly defended the gains of socialism and applied the noble idea of "By our nation itself," ushering in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 He made a great contribution to accomplishing the human cause of independence under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism and enjoyed boundless reverence and trust as a great defender of justice from the world progressive people.
					
					 We wholeheartedly hope that he will always live in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressive people.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings and book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Nakhodka and at the Gagarin Branch of S. Empe Bank of Russia on Jan. 24 and 27 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 On display in the venues of the events were books and photos showing the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Their participants watched Korean films including "Reply of Korea." 
					
					 The mayor of Nakhodka City said the noble image of Kim Jong Il who made great efforts for the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Russia, Maritime Territory of Russia in particular, would always be remembered by the Russian people.
					
					 The future of the DPRK is bright and promising as it holds the dear respected Kim Jong Un, faithful successor to his cause, in high esteem as the supreme leader, he added.
					
					 The mayor of Pokino City said Kim Jong Il developed and strengthened the Korean People's Army into an invincible army and mainstay and main force of the revolution taking the lead in upholding the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Nakhodka City Assembly noted that Kim Jong Il was a guardian of justice and outstanding leader as he conducted energetic activities for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The manager of the branch of the bank said the film show offered an opportunity to clearly realize why the high-handed practices and pressures of the U.S. cannot work on the DPRK, expressing the belief that the Korean people would surely emerge successful in the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversaries to Be Commemorated in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversaries to Be Commemorated in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Myanmar Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th Birth Anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il was formed on Feb. 3.
					 Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 In a notice the preparatory committee said that it would organize colorful political and cultural events for remembering the revolutionary career of the peerlessly great persons and praising the undying feats they performed for the Korean revolution and global independence in the period from February to April.

articles.title: Unemployment in US
articles.content:
Unemployment in US
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The total number of unemployed people in the United States amounted to 12.8 million in January, according to a report by the U.S. Labor Department on Friday.

articles.title: Excessive Radioactive Cesium Levels Found at 38 Farms in Japan
articles.content:
Excessive Radioactive Cesium Levels Found at 38 Farms in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The damage of the radioactive contamination caused by the crippled Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant in Japan is increasing.
					 The Fukushima prefectural government said Friday that 38 of the approximately 23,000 rice farms surveyed in the prefecture were found to have radioactive cesium levels in excess of the central government-set allowable limit of 500 Becquerels per kilogram.

articles.title: Great Loss of Net Profit in Japanese Enterprises
articles.content:
Great Loss of Net Profit in Japanese Enterprises
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The lasting economic slowdown caused a great loss of net profit in Japanese enterprises.
					 For the April to December period of last year, Sharp Corp. said it posted a group net loss of 213.50 billion yen.
					
					 Nomura Holdings Inc. logged a group net loss of 10.50 billion yen in the same period.

articles.title: Angola to Develop Education
articles.content:
Angola to Develop Education
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Angola is taking various steps for development of education.
					 Angola's Education Ministry will recruit about 13,000 new teachers for the 2012 year school year, according to the minister.
					
					 The minister also said that in the new academic year, the number of schools had been increased from 55,000 to 56,429.

articles.title: Sri Lanka Not to Be Influenced by Foreign Pressure
articles.content:
Sri Lanka Not to Be Influenced by Foreign Pressure
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa on Saturday said that his country will not be influenced by foreign pressure when looking for a political solution to the national issue in the country.
					 In an address to the nation as Sri Lanka celebrated 64 years of independence from British rule, Rajapaksa said that a solution to the national issue following the end of 30 years of war with Tamil Tiger rebels, can only be reached by the Sri Lankan parliament.
					
					 "We believe that the mechanism for solving the national question is the Parliamentary Select Committee. It is the duty of all parties in the country to solve problems according to the people's wishes by participating in this Parliamentary Select Committee rather than relying on imported solutions and utilizing foreign influences," Rajapaksa said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidades de fuerzas navales del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidades de fuerzas navales del EPC
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, inspecciono la comandancia de la unidad combinada 597 y unidades subordinadas a ella de las fuerzas navales del EPC.
					Estuvo primero en la unidad 790 que recibio el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					
					Dio a los marineros de la unidad binoculos y fusil automatico como recuerdos y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo recorrio las salas de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y de presentacion del historial, el buque visitado por  el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el monumento a sus historias revolucionarias.
					
					En un buque anclado en el puerto, averiguo el estado de movilizacion rutinario de los equipos tecnicos de combate y vio un ejercicio de los marineros.
					
					Presento las tareas para aumentar la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					Recorriendo la Casa de Militares y las instalaciones de servicios publicos de la unidad, se cercioro de los detalles de educacion politico-ideologica y de intendencia para los marineros.
					
					Acto seguido, Kim Jong Un inspecciono la unidad 158.
					
					Luego de dejar binoculos y fusil automatico a los marineros de la unidad como recuerdos, se retrato con ellos.
					
					A su paso por el cuarto de soldados, la sala de educacion, el comedor y otros puntos de una subunidad adscrita a la unidad, atendio con afecto paternal la vida de los marineros.
					
					Salio al puerto militar y dirigio a bordo del torpedero No. 1307 los ejercicios tacticos.
					
					Desde el puesto de mando de torpedero, presencio atentamente los ejercicios de los marineros y les estimulo ordenando que acelere mas el buque y lo mueva con valentia.
					
					Elogio al capitan de torpedero quien dirigia su buque con diestra nautica cambiando agil y correctamente las rutas de avance.
					
					Terminados los ejercicios, encomio a los marineros enfilados en la cubierta de proa y se fotografio junto a estos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo inspecciono seguidamente la comandancia de la unidad combinada 597.
					
					Tomo una fotografia de recuerdo junto con los militares de la unidad.
					
					Recorrio en primer lugar las salas de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y de presentacion del historial.
					
					En la trayectoria de desarrollo de la unidad combinada, estan registrados grandes meritos demostradores del poderio de la marina de guerra del EPC, tales como el hundimiento y la destruccion de numerosos buques enemigos de combate. Especial referencia merece el combate maritimo en Jumunjin que tuvo lugar durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), en el cual 4 torpederos del EPC hundieron el crucero pesado "Baltimore" del imperialismo norteamericano, merito sin precedente en la historia mundial de batallas navales.
					
					Al ver los objetos y datos historicos, el Comandante Supremo recordo con emocion la trayectoria orgullosa de la unidad combinada que vino marchando por la senda de victorias y glorias.
					
					Durante varios decenios, esta unidad ha manifestado sin reservas su abnegacion patriotica y heroismo colectivo en la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista, dijo y agrego que entre sus orgullosos meritos se destaca la captura del barco espia armado de EE.UU. "Pueblo" que habia invadido las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC.
					
					Prosiguio que los oficiales y soldados de la unidad combinada deben seguir demostrando en el futuro tambien su invencible poderio en la defensa a ultranza de la patria dando continuidad a tales tradiciones.
					
					Recorriendo los establecimientos militares, las salas de estudio de operaciones, de leccion y la biblioteca, se entero detalladamente del estado de cumplimiento de la mision por la unidad.
					
					Elogio a todos los comandantes y miembros del Estado Mayor que se preparan para comandar diestramente las operaciones maritimas en cualesquier circunstancias dificiles, al acondicionar bien las salas de estudio de operaciones de modo que puedan estudiar profundamente las autoctonas estrategias y tacticas militares y los metodos de combate del PTC y al ejercitar sustancialmente para elevar su capacidad de organizar y dirigir las operaciones y batallas maritimas.
					
					En Corea rodeada de mares en sus tres lados, la posicion y el papel de las fuerzas navales son muy importantes, senalo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de directiva en fortalecer a las fuerzas navales.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador brasileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador brasileno
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Federativa del Brasil en Corea, Arnaldo Carrilho, quien le hizo una visita de despedida. 
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller coreano Kim Hyong Jun y los miembros de la embajada brasilena.

articles.title: Embajador ruso rechaza desinformaciones anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Embajador ruso rechaza desinformaciones anti-RPDC
Moscu, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- En entrevista con Interfax, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Federacion Rusa en Corea, Valery Sukhinin, dijo que los medios de comunicacion masiva tratan con prejuicio la situacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y las relaciones de esta con Rusia y tergiversan la realidad. 
					Lamentablemente, los medios extranjeros de comunicacion masiva suelen producir repercusiones con unas informaciones infundadas en la cobertura de dichos temas inclinandose a tergiversar los hechos, dijo el embajador.
					
					Pese al impacto de fallecimiento de su Dirigente, Corea vive y trabaja con normalidad, apunto.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia entrenamiento militar EE.UU.-Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia entrenamiento militar EE.UU.-Japon
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Inicio desde el 24 de enero hasta el 5 de febrero en Japon el entrenamiento militar conjunto Estados Unidos-Japon intitulado "Yamasakura" con la participacion de las fuerzas terrestres norteamericanas en el Pacifico y en Japon y las "fuerzas terrestres de autodefensa" del pais isleno.
					El presente simulacro belico amenaza severamente la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Revela asi el periodico Minju Joson en su comentario individual insertado este martes y continua:
					
					En este simulacro participaron por primera vez en la historia el octavo ejercito norteamericano estacionado en el territorio surcoreano que cumplio el papel medular en la pasada guerra de agresion de Estados Unidos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ahora desempena el rol importante en sus maniobras belicas anti-RPDC.
					
					El hecho insinua que EE.UU. intenta tomar la heguemonia militar no solo en la Peninsula Coreana sino que tambien en toda la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					En el caso en que se ejecute forzosamente la estrategia de EE.UU. de dar importancia militar a esta region, se exacerbaran mas el antagonismo y los choques militares entre EE.UU. y otros paises y a la larga, se creara el peligroso estado de enfrentamiento militar.
					
					La "paz" y la "seguridad" de que habla tanto  EE.UU. son para enganar a la sociedad internacional y realizar su ambicion de la agresion,  la guerra, la hegemonia y la dominacion.
					
					EE.UU. debe darse clara cuenta de la severa consecuencia que emane de su anacronica politica de hegemonia y enfrentamiento militares.

articles.title: ACNC comenta situacion agonica de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ACNC comenta situacion agonica de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, repudiada por la opinion publica por sus crimenes nunca perdonables, lanza todavia los disparates sin fundamentos. 
					El lacayo de Chongwadae (Casa Azul), Yun Sang Hyon, parlamentario del "Partido Saenuri", dijo que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea produce de modo organizativo la droga y la divulga al Sur de Corea y China. 
					
					Esto parte de su intento absurdo y grosero de manchar  de todos modos la imagen internacional de la RPDC y evadir la demanda de la opinion publica interna de sentenciar a la banda traidora. 
					
					Esta invento esta farsa villana por temor ante la unidad monolitica de la RPDC que se hace mas fuerte despues del gran duelo nacional. 
					
					Al herir a la parte connacional adolorida por el gran duelo nacional, la banda de traidores surcoreanos llevo a la ruptura total las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					Tan pronto como cambio el nombre de su partido por "Partido Saenuri", esta agrupacion politica gano la estimacion de "partido de harapos" por sus crimenes de haber convertido el suelo surcoreano en el infierno humano. 
					
					Para salvarse de esta situacion desvergonzada, creo diariamente las "informaciones sensacionales" carentes de fundamentos y ahora inventa el problema de droga. 
					
					Pero, con tal artimana no puede enganar la opinion publica ni encubrir sus crimenes, sino adelantara solo su arruinamiento tragico. 
					
					Cada cual responde por sus actos. 
					
					El periodico online, que repite los datos falsificados, tambien debe estar en su sano juicio.
